meta_info.name: CONTACT
meta_info.description: Description of a means of contact of a Party. Actual structure is archetyped.

functions.name: purpose
functions.meaning: Purpose for which this contact is used, e.g. mail,  daytime phone, etc. Taken from value of inherited `_name_` attribute.

attributes.name: addresses
attributes.description: A set of address alternatives for this contact purpose and time validity combination.

attributes.name: time_validity
attributes.description: Valid time interval for this contact descriptor.
